languages.text: "Может, она и неграмотная еретичка, но толика благоразумия в ней все же есть".

traits.locale_text: "Она даже читать не умеет. Какая ей власть?"
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "She may be an illiterate heretic, but at least there is a modicum of sense in her."
languages.original_text: "Может, она и неграмотная еретичка, но толика благоразумия в ней все же есть".

traits.locale_text: "She may be an illiterate heretic, but there is a modicum of good sense in her."

languages.text: “或许她确实是个大字不识的异端分子，但她至少还有点理智。”
languages.original_text: "She may be an illiterate heretic, but at least there is a modicum of sense in her."

traits.locale_text: “或许她确实是个大字不识的异端分子，但她至少还有点理智。”

languages.text: 「彼女は読み書きのできない異端者かもしれませんが、少なくとも少しはセンスがあります」
languages.original_text: "She may be an illiterate heretic, but at least there is a modicum of sense in her."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女は読み書きのできない異端者かもしれませんが、少なくとも少しはセンスがあります」

languages.text: «Puede que sea una hereje analfabeta, pero al menos tiene dos dedos de frente».
languages.original_text: "She may be an illiterate heretic, but at least there is a modicum of sense in her."

traits.locale_text: «Puede que sea una hereje analfabeta, pero al menos tiene dos dedos de frente».

languages.text: "Okuma yazma bilmeyen bir kâfir olabilir ama en azından bir nebze aklı var."
languages.original_text: "She may be an illiterate heretic, but at least there is a modicum of sense in her."

traits.locale_text: "Okuma yazma bilmeyen bir kâfir olabilir ama en azından bir nebze aklı var."

languages.text: « C'est peut-être une hérétique illettrée, mais elle fait au moins preuve d'un minimum de bon sens. »
languages.original_text: "She may be an illiterate heretic, but at least there is a modicum of sense in her."

traits.locale_text: « C'est peut-être une hérétique illettrée, mais elle fait au moins preuve d'un minimum de bon sens. »

languages.text: "Sie mag eine Ketzerin sein, die weder schreiben noch lesen kann, aber zumindest ist sie nicht ganz dumm."
languages.original_text: "She may be an illiterate heretic, but at least there is a modicum of sense in her."

traits.locale_text: "Sie mag eine Ketzerin sein, die weder schreiben noch lesen kann, aber zumindest ist sie nicht ganz dumm."
